name: Sight's Adventure (Mac)
description: Sight's Adventure is a 2-D Top Down Game based around the Bible. You will learn about the Bible by answering questions when you defeat an enemy, Deciding what path to go, or going through locations based from the Bible. Sight(the orange guy) can throw boomerangs as fast as you can click. He can also use power-ups in the form of the tie he has. In order to activate a power-up Sight would have to use dye containers to color his tie. That process is known as "Tie-dye".
